mapper.sql: id, trans_id, account_id, direction, amount, quantity, price, commodity_code
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS total_income FROM fin_entries e INNER JOIN fin_accounts a ON e.account_id = a.id INNER JOIN fin_transactions t ON e.trans_id = t.id WHERE a.account_type = 'INCOME' AND e.book_id = #{bookId} AND t.trans_date >= #{monthStart} AND t.trans_date <= #{monthEnd}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS total_expense FROM fin_entries e INNER JOIN fin_accounts a ON e.account_id = a.id INNER JOIN fin_transactions t ON e.trans_id = t.id WHERE a.account_type = 'EXPENSE' AND e.book_id = #{bookId} AND t.trans_date >= #{monthStart} AND t.trans_date <= #{monthEnd}

SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(a.initial_balance), 0) FROM fin_accounts a WHERE a.account_type = 'ASSET' AND a.is_archived = false AND a.is_leaf = true AND a.book_id = #{bookId}) + (SELECT COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) FROM fin_entries e INNER JOIN fin_accounts a ON e.account_id = a.id WHERE a.account_type = 'ASSET' AND e.book_id = #{bookId}) , 0)

SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(a.initial_balance), 0) FROM fin_accounts a WHERE a.account_type = 'LIABILITY' AND a.is_archived = false AND a.is_leaf = true AND a.book_id = #{bookId}) + (SELECT COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) FROM fin_entries e INNER JOIN fin_accounts a ON e.account_id = a.id WHERE a.account_type = 'LIABILITY' AND e.book_id = #{bookId}) , 0)

SELECT e.account_id, COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS net_amount FROM fin_entries e WHERE e.book_id = #{bookId} GROUP BY e.account_id

SELECT a.id AS account_id, a.name AS account_name, a.icon AS account_icon, COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS total_amount FROM fin_entries e INNER JOIN fin_accounts a ON e.account_id = a.id INNER JOIN fin_transactions t ON e.trans_id = t.id WHERE a.account_type = 'EXPENSE' AND e.book_id = #{bookId} AND t.trans_date >= #{startDate} AND t.trans_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.icon HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END) > 0 ORDER BY total_amount DESC

SELECT a.id AS account_id, a.name AS account_name, a.icon AS account_icon, COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS total_amount FROM fin_entries e INNER JOIN fin_accounts a ON e.account_id = a.id INNER JOIN fin_transactions t ON e.trans_id = t.id WHERE a.account_type = 'INCOME' AND e.book_id = #{bookId} AND t.trans_date >= #{startDate} AND t.trans_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.icon HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END) > 0 ORDER BY total_amount DESC

SELECT tag.id AS tag_id, tag.tag_name, tag.color AS tag_color, tag.icon AS tag_icon, COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS total_amount, COUNT(DISTINCT t.id) AS trans_count FROM fin_entries e INNER JOIN fin_accounts a ON e.account_id = a.id INNER JOIN fin_transactions t ON e.trans_id = t.id INNER JOIN fin_trans_tags tt ON t.id = tt.trans_id INNER JOIN fin_tags tag ON tt.tag_id = tag.id WHERE a.account_type = 'EXPENSE' AND e.book_id = #{bookId} AND t.trans_date >= #{startDate} AND t.trans_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY tag.id, tag.tag_name, tag.color, tag.icon HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END) > 0 ORDER BY total_amount DESC

SELECT a.id AS account_id, a.name AS account_name, a.icon AS account_icon, COALESCE(a.initial_balance, 0) + COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS balance FROM fin_accounts a LEFT JOIN fin_entries e ON a.id = e.account_id AND e.book_id = #{bookId} WHERE a.account_type = 'ASSET' AND a.is_leaf = true AND a.is_archived = false AND a.book_id = #{bookId} GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.icon, a.initial_balance, a.sort_order ORDER BY a.sort_order ASC, a.id ASC

SELECT a.id AS account_id, a.name AS account_name, a.icon AS account_icon, COALESCE(a.initial_balance, 0) + COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN e.direction = 'CREDIT' THEN e.amount WHEN e.direction = 'DEBIT' THEN -e.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS balance FROM fin_accounts a LEFT JOIN fin_entries e ON a.id = e.account_id AND e.book_id = #{bookId} WHERE a.account_type = 'LIABILITY' AND a.is_leaf = true AND a.is_archived = false AND a.book_id = #{bookId} GROUP BY a.id, a.name, a.icon, a.initial_balance, a.sort_order ORDER BY a.sort_order ASC, a.id ASC
